title: The Tale Of Helvetica & Comic Sans
content:
I thought this community might be interested in The Tale of Helvetica & Comic Sans by [Bertie Wells](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819165147/http:/typophile.com/wiki/%20http%3A/%252Fbertiewells.bandcamp.com%20). Is there a pending class war represented by those that use Helvetica in their work and those that use Comic Sans?

Here's the video on Youtube: [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XsZGXf9ecoM](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819165147/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=XsZGXf9ecoM "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XsZGXf9ecoM")  
Here's the song on Bandcamp: [http://bertiewells.bandcamp.com/track/the-tale-of-helvetica-comic-sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819165147/http:/bertiewells.bandcamp.com/track/the-tale-of-helvetica-comic-sans "http://bertiewells.bandcamp.com/track/the-tale-of-helvetica-comic-sans")
author: oddmachine
